name: Dance Central 2
description: Music Downloads Not Rated by the ESRB The Games on Demand version supports English, French, Italian, German, Spanish, Dutch, Polish, Potuguese, Russian, Japanese, Korean, Chinese. Get ready for the sequel to the best-selling dance game for Kinect™ for Xbox 360®! Featuring another killer soundtrack, new simultaneous multiplayer and all-new dance crews, Dance Central™ 2 is sure to get your party started!
